reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Challenging assignments, but very rewarding.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Makes complex topics easy to understand. Always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but sometimes rushes through material. Lab sessions could be better organized.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Assignments encourage critical thinking. Could improve on feedback timeliness.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher! Brings real-world examples into lectures. Fair grading and helpful office hours.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Difficult to follow in class. Doesn't explain concepts well. Homework is much harder than lecture material.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful discussions in class. Encourages diverse interpretations. Sometimes assigns too much reading.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Lectures are informative but dry. Good at explaining complex theories. Could use more real-world applications.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Amazing professor! Makes chemistry fun and accessible. Great lab experiments and clear instructions.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Encourages class participation. Sometimes goes off-topic, but always interesting.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Field trips are great, but lectures can be disorganized.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Extremely knowledgeable and engaging. Makes art come alive. Assignments are creative and fun.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Stimulating discussions on current events. Fair grader. Could provide more structure in group projects.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Seems biased in lectures. Doesn't encourage diverse viewpoints. Grading criteria are unclear.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fantastic teacher! Makes complex language concepts accessible. Great at fostering class discussions.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Good practical knowledge, but lectures can be monotonous. Case studies are helpful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Assignments are challenging but fair. Sometimes speaks too quickly.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Excellent at explaining complex concepts. Very helpful during office hours. Challenging but fair exams.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Clearly knows the material well, but can be condescending to students. Interesting lab work.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Assignments are creative. Could provide more individual feedback.
